nodes.bodyText: Does e.getMessage() always return the source name? Otherwise let's change the exception message
Are we going to add test cases for these particular negative cases or just ignore them? If ignoring let's remove the commented code

These test cases should ideally be enabled since these are scenarios with no diagnostic issues (positive test cases).
But at the moment these are failing due to some parser issues which are yet to be fixed. Once those are fixed this can be enabled, and ideally, these test cases shouldn't fail.

I think its better to fail the test here and disable any-failing tests, if there are issues from the parser.
Otherwise, any newly failing test would go un-noticed .
In the git-issue, we can ask to enable the formatter test as well, once fixed.
